features: Our Natural Face Wash for Women and Men deeply cleanses and gently exfoliates away dead skin cells while keeping your skin feeling hydrated and your complexion looking radiant.

When used daily, our vegan cleanser helps to improve the appearance of pores, sun spots, discoloration, and blemishes. Formulated for all skin types, including dry, sensitive, oily, and blemish prone.
Packed with natural and organic plant-based ingredients, our anti aging face wash is tough on dirt and impurities yet gentle on your skin thanks to soothing aloe vera.
Our facial skin care products are always free of harmfuI ingredients such as parabens, silicones, sulfates, or phthalates.
Discover Beauty The Natural Way - Natural and Organic Ingredients. Vegan. Cruelty-free. Eve Hansen products Made in USA. No Sulfates. No Parabens. No Phthalates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cleanser and fast delivery!
reviews.reviewText: Love that this has no animal testing involved in the development of the face wash. Being in the skin care industry I look for products with simple clean ingredients. Vitamin C is shown to have multiple benefits for a skin wash which includes skin brightening effects. Overall easy use and simple clean up with feel of refreshed skin afterwards. My skin did not feel super oily after washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Refreshing and makes skin feel clean and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and have no problems with this. Skin feels clean.. the bottle as last 2 months already...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Burns my eyes
reviews.reviewText: This facewash works well. It gets stubborn makeup off, it lathers nicely, and it rinses well. It doesn’t smell very nice though. I expected it to be citrusy, but it’s more like a wood polish smell. It’s also burns quite bad if you get it in your eyes! So beware!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Great product! I have been struggling with severe hyper pigmentation for several years. I have extremely fair Irish skin and had never worn sunscreen on my face because I live in South Carolina where our summers routinely get well above 100° and the humidity makes wearing thick sunscreens on your face nearly unbearable. It's like being coated in layers of wax. Fast forward a few years, and I now have large areas of hyper pigmentation on the left side of my face from driving in my car.I spent hundreds of dollars going to the dermatologist and they prescribed Retin-A, but that was too harsh on my sensitive skin and within days I was peeling like a snake and had chemical burns all over my cheeks. After reading extensively about various skin care alternatives, I heard that vitamin C could be beneficial along with several glycolic products for sensitive skin.In only a couple of weeks of using glycolic products specifically formulated for sensitive skin, coupled with this vitamin C cleanser, I am already seeing more fading of the dark spots on my skin that I ever did with the prescription Retin-A and it has never been softer. Even the ginormous pores on my t-zone have drastically improved.I believe in the benefits of vitamin C for skin, especially for treating skin issues like hyper pigmentation. I can't recommend this product enough. Cheaper than the dermatologist and more gentle for sensitive skin. Word of caution: vitamin C and similar products cause extreme sensitivity to the sun. If you're not already wearing sunscreen, start immediately and never go outside while using these products without applying it generously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is an excellent product. It doesn’t dry out your face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect product for aging skin
reviews.reviewText: This product is non scented. This product works perfectly with the right moisturizer it gets your skin very clean and follow it up with your daily moisturizer your skin will be glowing in no time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works great on my face. The only issue I have with this cleanser that when I wash my face after putting this cleanser on my face, when sometimes it gets into my eyes, it burns.
